text: The Armistice of Copenhagen of 1537 ended the Danish war known as the Count's Feud. No formal peace was signed but the Swedish debt to Lübeck was considered settled and the trade monopoly of Lübeck in Sweden came to an end. ==References== Category:History of Lübeck Category:Hanseatic League Copenhagen Category:History of Copenhagen Category:1537 in Europe Category:1537 in Denmark
title: Armistice of Copenhagen
